text: ٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحۡيِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَاۚ قَدۡ بَيَّنَّا لَكُمُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ

translation.en: Know that Allah gives life to the earth after its lifelessness. We have made clear to you the signs; perhaps you will understand
translation.id: Ketahuilah bahwa Allah yang menghidupkan bumi setelah matinya (kering). Sungguh, telah Kami jelaskan kepadamu tanda-tanda (kebesaran Kami) agar kamu mengerti
